Web map analytics

Turn web map interactions into actionable insights and increase engagement on your web maps.

Rich Analytics

See how your users are interacting with your maps.

Unline traditional analytics software, Maptiks provides in-depth user insights by tracking how users click, pan zoom and interact with your web map.

Built for geospatial

Maptiks is built GIS developers and teams of medium to large businesses who require richer, detailed analytics on there web maps. Learn more.

Reliability & uptime

We process our data across a massively distributed network of reliable servers to ensure 99.99% uptime, always. Learn more.

1 Maptiks Analytics “start tracking leaflet right meow!”
2
3 <script src="//cdn.leafletjs/leaflet-0.7.5/"></script>
4  <!-- ADD NEXT TWO LINES AFTER LIBRARY HAS LOADED -->
5      
6     
7  <script src="//cdn.maptiks.min.js"></script>
8  <script>maptiks.trackcode='67f8ce06-141e';</script>
9    
10    
11 <!-- ADD TWO LINES BEFORE MAP IS INITIALIZED -->   
12 <script src="/path/to/leaflet.js"></script>
Simple Setup

Lightweight and compatible with all modern web maps.

Track all of your web maps in one central location. We currently support LeafletJS, OpenLayers3 and Google Maps API.

High Praise

Maptiks is great. Our team deploys maps that people actually use. Before this we couldn't see how our users were converting”

Anne Deschesnes, Product Manager of Geo Retention

Web Map Metrics

#buildabettermap with better data.

Core Features

Insights into your users activities.

Key metrics that convert

With Maptiks mapping analytics software, you can do more than just get error logs and map performance. You can actually see how users are interacting with your map, providing unprecedented consumer insights.


Pin point user activities

See how users are interacting with your maps and gain unprecedented user engagement insights. With the activity heatmap, you can quickly view the most active sections of your map at a


Simple Plan Management

Free to start. Bump up your plan to track additional web maps.

Free Plan

Perfect for smaller projects and testing before deployment.

  • 5k monthly map loads
  • 4 day data history
  • 3 trackable maps
  • 1 trackcode
  • standard support
  • download feature sheet
Developer

Ideal for geogeeks and serious web map builders.

  • 20k monthly map loads
  • unlimited data history
  • 10 trackable maps
  • 1 trackcode
  • premium support
  • download feature sheet
Enterprise

A plan that scales to any size project with premium integrations.

  • 200k monthly map loads
  • unlimited data history
  • unlimited trackable maps
  • 1 trackcode
  • premium support
  • download feature sheet
